welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Savigny-sur-Orge, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that our lovely town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited usage and no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The modern and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
